Interface CompanyService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompanyServiceImpl
public interface CompanyService
The interface for the company service.

    • getTitleList

      static List<Title> getTitleList()
      Retrieves the list of Titles.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Titles

    • reloadData

      void reloadData()
      Reloads the company service data.

    • getDepartmentCollection

      Collection<Department> getDepartmentCollection()
      Retrieves the Collection of Departments.
      Returns:
      a Collection of Departments

    • findDepartment

      Department findDepartment(long departmentId) throws CompanyException
      Finds a Department by its id.
      Parameters:
      departmentId - the id of the Department
      Returns:
      the Department
      Throws:
      CompanyException - if the department is not found

    • createDepartment

      Department createDepartment()
      Creates a new Department.
      Returns:
      the new Department

    • saveDepartment

      void saveDepartment(Department department)
      Saves the given Department.
      Parameters:
      department - the Department to save

    • deleteDepartment

      void deleteDepartment(long departmentId) throws CompanyException
      Deletes a Department by its id.
      Parameters:
      departmentId - the id of the Department
      Throws:
      CompanyException - if the department is not found

    • findEmployee

      Employee findEmployee(long departmentId, long employeeId) throws CompanyException
      Finds an Employee by the id of the Department and the id of the Employee.
      Parameters:
      departmentId - the id of the Department
      employeeId - the id of the Employee
      Returns:
      the Employee
      Throws:
      CompanyException - if the employee is not found

    • createEmployee

      Employee createEmployee(long departmentId) throws CompanyException
      Creates a new Employee for the given department id.
      Parameters:
      departmentId - the id of the Department
      Returns:
      the new Employee
      Throws:
      CompanyException - if the employee cannot be created

    • saveEmployee

      void saveEmployee(Employee employee) throws CompanyException
      Saves the given Employee.
      Parameters:
      employee - the Employee to save
      Throws:
      CompanyException - if the employee cannot be saved

    • deleteEmployee

      void deleteEmployee(long departmentId, long employeeId) throws CompanyException
      Deletes an Employee by the id of the Department and the id of the Employee.
      Parameters:
      departmentId - the id of the Department
      employeeId - the id of the Employee
      Throws:
      CompanyException - if the employee is not found
